description: head, torso and upper legs of standing figure, holding partially reclining boy down by his head; man holds dagger in PR hand; man turns to look at small angel behind man holds man's PL arm; sketchy; watermarks (or pencil sketches?) on back of mount--shield and circle with bird
provenance: Sale, Christie's, London, July 6, 1982, no.166, as Anonymous, 17th century, for Â£320, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1982-d.2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Sacrifice of Isaac
